function.description: Check health of all deployed MCP services via SSH (local) and Cloudflare tunnel (HTTPS). Returns per-service status and an aggregate health summary.
function.name: infra.check_fleet

host.description: SSH host target for local checks.

scope.description: Check scope: 'local' (SSH to VM), 'tunnel' (Cloudflare HTTPS), or 'full' (both).

services.description: Specific service names to check. If null, checks all registered services.
